items.name: The Good Stuff
items.customDescription: +20% Chance to Brew Mature Alcohol in Cooking, but takes 3x as long to Brew Alcohol. One item is consumed per Brewing action.

items.name: Bucket of Water
items.customDescription: It's a bucket. And it's filled with, like, water, and stuff.

items.name: Ale Yeast
items.customDescription: A bag of ale yeast used for brewing ales, malts, and grog.

items.name: Holy Cow Brew
items.customDescription:
+10% Food Healing Value and -25% Prayer Point Cost
25% Chance to be afflicted with a 15% Slow for 2 turns at the start of a fight.

items.name: Holy Cow Brew (Mature)
items.customDescription:
+15% Food Healing Value and -31% Prayer Point Cost
37.5% Chance to be afflicted with a 19% Slow for 2 turns at the start of a fight.

items.name: Apple Cider
items.customDescription:
-25% Farming Seed Cost and +1.5% Farming Skill XP and Mastery XP.
-25% Compost Preservation Chance and -5% Product when Harvesting.

items.name: Apple Cider (Mature)
items.customDescription:
-37.5% Farming Seed Cost and +2% Farming Skill XP and Mastery XP.
-25% Compost Preservation Chance and -7.5% Product when Harvesting.

items.name: Darkblood Grog
items.customDescription:
+50 Maximum Hit Points and +2.5% Bleed Lifesteal.
-50% Hitpoint Regeneration and 10% chance on enemy hit to be inflicted with Bleed that deals 100% of the damage dealt as damage over 20s.

items.name: Darkblood Grog (Mature)
items.customDescription:
+75 Maximum Hit Points and +3% Bleed Lifesteal.
-75% Hitpoint Regeneration and 12.5% chance on enemy hit to be inflicted with Bleed that deals 200% of the damage dealt as damage over 20s.

items.name: Dragonbane Mead
items.customDescription: +10% Maximum Hit and +10% Global Accuracy Rating when afflicted by Burn, but +20% Damage Taken from Dragonbreath and Burn.

items.name: Dragonbane Mead (Mature)
items.customDescription: +15% Maximum Hit and +15% Global Accuracy Rating when afflicted by Dragonbreath, but +30% Damage Taken from Dragonbreath and Burn.

items.name: Facekicker
items.customDescription: -20% Attack Interval, but -20% Global Accuracy Rating and -10% Global Skill XP.

items.name: Facekicker (Mature)
items.customDescription: -30% Attack Interval, but -30% Global Accuracy Rating and -15% Global Skill XP.

items.name: Fool's Gold Ale
items.customDescription:
Automatically sell Common Drops from Thieving for 3x their base value.
-40% Chance to receive Area Uniques and -40% Chance to avoid Stuns in Thieving.

items.name: Fool's Gold Ale (Mature)
items.customDescription:
Automatically sell Common Drops from Thieving for 4.5x their base value.
-60% Chance to receive Area Uniques and -60% Chance to avoid Stuns in Thieving.

items.name: Huntress' Stout
items.customDescription:
+15% Ranged Strength Bonus with a 2H Ranged Weapon and +2 Flat Ranged Accuracy Bonus per 0.1s of Attack Interval.
+10% Ranged Attack Interval and -10% Melee Evasion.

items.name: Huntress' Stout (Mature)
items.customDescription:
+22.5% Ranged Strength Bonus with a 2H Ranged Weapon and +3 Flat Ranged Accuracy Bonus per 0.1s of Attack Interval.
+15% Ranged Attack Interval and -15% Melee Evasion.

items.name: One Foot in the Grave
items.customDescription:
+20% Damage Dealt when affected by 2 or more effects.
Become afflicted with 1-5 Random Curses (15% Chance per Curse) at the start of a fight.

items.name: One Foot in the Grave (Mature)
items.customDescription:
+30% Damage Dealt when affected by 2 or more effects.
Become afflicted with 1-5 Random Curses (30% Chance per Curse) at the start of a fight.

items.name: Sailors_Respite
items.customDescription:
-10% Fishing Interval.
-5% Chance for Global Rare Items, Special Items, and Doubling Items in Fishing

items.name: Sailors_Respite (Mature)
items.customDescription:
-15% Fishing Interval.
-7.5% Chance for Global Rare Items, Special Items, and Doubling Items in Fishing

items.name: Sourberry Ale
items.customDescription:
-15% Passive Cooking Interval.
+100% Cost to Produce Food in Cooking.

items.name: Sourberry Ale (Mature)
items.customDescription:
-30% Passive Cooking Interval.
+200% Cost to Produce Food in Cooking.

items.name: The Firebreather
items.customDescription:
+10% Chance to receive Ash and Coal in Firemaking and +5% Firemaking XP.
+5% Firemaking Interval.

items.name: The Firebreather (Mature)
items.customDescription:
+15% Chance to receive Random Products (e.g. Ash) in Firemaking and +7.5% Firemaking XP.
+7.5% Firemaking Interval.

items.name: The Green Golbin
items.customDescription:
+10% Chance to Preserve and Double items in Herblore.
-10% Herblore Skill XP and Mastery XP.

items.name: The Green Golbin (Mature)
items.customDescription:
+15% Chance to Preserve and Double items in Herblore.
-15% Herblore Skill XP and Mastery XP.

items.name: The Two Flower
items.customDescription:
+5% Chance to Dodge Attacks and +10% Global Evasion.
Enemies get +5% Maximum Hit.

items.name: The Two Flower (Mature)
items.customDescription:
+7.5% Chance to Dodge Attacks and +15% Global Evasion.
Enemies get +10% Maximum Hit.

items.name: Gardening Apron
items.customDescription: -2.5% Farming Growth Interval. +5% chance to preserve seeds when harvesting Shrubs and Flowers.

items.name: Superfertilizer
items.customDescription: Fills Farming Compost to 100% per use. +30% Increased crop harvest

items.name: Nasturtium
items.customDescription: +17.5% Farming Yield for Watermelon, Booberry, and Goldengod Hops. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Thyme
items.customDescription: +15% Farming Yield for Cabbage, Poison Ivy, and Bell Peppers. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: White Lily
items.customDescription: +5% Farming Yield for all crops and +10% chance to preserve Compost. Consumed on Harvesting.

items.name: Rose
items.customDescription: +12.5% Farming Yield for Potatoes, Wildblood Hops, and Coffee Beans. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Tulip
items.customDescription: +10% Farming Yield for Blueberries, Orange Trees, and Plumm Hops. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Sunflower
items.customDescription: +7.5% Farming Yield for Onions, Tomatoes, Sweetcorn, and Carrots. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Lavender
items.customDescription: +5% Farming Yield for all Shrubs and Hops. +5% chance to preserve Food when eaten. Consumed on Planting, Harvesting, and on Eating.

items.name: Barley
items.customDescription: Used as an ingredient in Brewing Alcohol.

items.name: Lantern Oil
items.customDescription:
+2.5% Flat Slayer Area Effect Negation and +5% Global Accuracy Rating.
+5% Global Accuracy Rating when equipped with Blazing Lantern and Shroud of the Badlands.

items.name: Shroud of the Badlands
items.customDescription:
+20% Flat Slayer Area Effect Negation and -0.05 Attack Interval.
+10% Flat Slayer Area Effect Negation when equipped with Blazing Lantern.

items.name: Tormented Bracelet
items.customDescription: Greatly increased Magic Accuracy Rating and Magic Damage. Greatly decreased Defence bonuses and Damage Reduction.

items.name: Pure Elementalist Sceptre

items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Damage when using Water Spells. +2% chance to Freeze target on hit.

Passive: +5 Minimum Damage when using Elemental Spells.
+6% Accuracy Rating and Maximum Hit when using Surge Spells.

items.name: Fragmented Elemental Rune
items.customDescription: Provides 1 Rune of each element. +10 Minimum and Maximum Elemental Spell Dmg. One item is consumed whenever Runes are used.

items.name: Elemental Cape
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Elemental Spell Dmg

items.name: Chieftain Erik's Head
items.customDescription: The head of the tyrannical chieftain of Barbarian Village, a sign of true strength to the Barbarians.

items.name: Barbarian Archer Helm
items.customDescription: When equipped with any Throwing Weapon: +5% Ranged Crit Chance and +10% Ranged Accuracy Rating

items.name: Barbarian Berserker Helm
items.customDescription:
Passive: While at or below 50% of your Maximum Hit Points, gain: +10% Melee Maximum Hit, -10% Attack Interval, +10% Melee Crit Chance, and -30% Global Evasion.
When equipped with Barbarian Berserker Axe, gain +2% Melee Lifesteal.

items.name: Barbarian Warrior Helm
items.customDescription: When equipped with Barbarian Longblade, gain +25% Melee Accuracy Rating.

items.name: Barbarian Boots
items.customDescription:
Passive: +1% melee crit chance

Passive: +2% melee crit chance
When equipped with Barbarian Armour and Barbarian Boots: +10% crit chance

items.name: Barbarian Armour
items.customDescription:
Passive: +3% melee crit chance
When equipped with Barbarian Skirt and Barbarian Boots: +10% crit chance

items.name: Barbarian Longblade
items.customDescription: When equipped with Barbarian Warrior Helm, gain +25% Melee Accuracy Rating.

items.name: Barbarian Fletching Knife
items.customDescription: -5% Fletching Interval when fletching Shortbows, Longbows, and Standard Arrows when equipped as a Weapon.

10% of your Strength Level added as Hidden Strength levels
50% of your Attack Level subtracted as Hidden Attack Levels

items.customDescription:
10% of your Strength Level added as Hidden Strength levels
50% of your Attack Level subtracted as Hidden Attack Levels
